name: Jelly Star: Special Yummy Mania
description:
Jelly Star - Special Yummy Mania features:
• Collect jelly drops to advance along the candy track for special surprises!
• Tasty Jelly graphics that will leave you hungry for more
• Unwrap delicious environments and sweetest gameplay in the wonderland
• Helpful magical boosters to help with challenging levels
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
• Hundreds of sweet levels in the Jelly Kingdom - more added every month!
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
